elements.label: Loft of my house
elements.description: Пыльный чердак. Когда-то все эти вещи были нужными и о них бережно заботились. Но не теперь.
elements.comment: My father store his old junk on the loft. Probably I can find something here.

elements.label: Commission: Secret Histories
elements.description: Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with any information you can assemble on the secret histories of the world. [You'll need a matching Lore fragment of at least level 2 to complete this commission.]
